subject: Sir,
body:
Sir,
My name is Michael Mensah Baah, I am the Deputy Chief Executive Officer, Development Bank Ghana. We have made several efforts to contact you since two days but to no avail. We authorized our delivering agent to deliver an accrued interest payment of $840,00 USD to your residential address, remember we don't disclose contents of the box to the agents for security reasons, but the information reaching us this morning is that he is at New York JFK John F. Kennedy International Airport and was interrupted by the customs and immigration due to misplacement of your contact information on transit, his name is Danso Duku, you can check up on him to know what his problem is all about. Please contact him on Email: 
dukudanso0@gmail.com
for more details on how to get to your home for safety.
Please reconfirm the following information to him quickly.
* Full Name
* Residential Address
* Mobile Phone Number
* Any government Id
Regards,
Michael Mensah Baah.

subject: Re:   Sir,
body:
Dear Michael Mensah Baah,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I apologize for not being available when you tried to contact me earlier. I appreciate your efforts in trying to deliver the accrued interest payment to my address.

I understand that your delivering agent, Danso Duku, is currently facing some issues at the New York JFK John F. Kennedy Airport customs. Could you please provide me with more details about his situation? I would like to know what exactly is causing the delay and how we can resolve it.

Before I proceed, could you kindly clarify why my government ID is required? Is it necessary for the delivery process or for any other specific reason?

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Helen

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
Helen.

I have been held up without any help for one month plus and they could not
allow me at access my email message,till this morning when I reported to
Salvatore Ingrassia - Port Director JFK Airport - U.S. Customs and Border
Protection ans he issued instruction to release my mobile so that I can
contact my people.
Michael has been doing his best, still the authorities of the New York JFK
John F. Kennedy Airport customs are very strict.

I lost some of your document on transits and they said I must provide it
before they can look into my case. One of the officers is asking for some
money to stop the inspection of the box. If you can send me your full name,
contact address, your mobile phone number, you can provide any ID if not
government Id, driver's license will fine.

So that I can do the submission today and see what next they will ask me to
do.

Kindly do the needful.

Danso Duku.
New York JFK John F. Kennedy Airport.
Mobile +1 332 209 2425 whatsapp

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
Hello Helen, thank you for sharing this information with me. It sounds like you are going through a challenging situation at the JFK Airport. Can you tell me more about what happened with your documents and why they are asking for money to stop the inspection of the box? I want to understand the full picture before offering any advice or assistance.

Best wishes,
Helen

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
Can you tell me more about what happened with your documents?
I said I lost my documents while on transit to New York here.

Why are they asking for money to stop the inspection of the box?
Normally they inspect boxes that are fragile and  sealed to know the
content, without them having access into the content of the box, they will
inspect and scan it as their usual process, if there are harmful objects,
or anything related to drugs or money laundering.

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
Oh, I see. It sounds like a standard procedure for them to inspect packages to ensure safety and security. It's common for authorities to take precautions when they come across packages without proper documentation or that raise any concerns. Have they given you any specific reasons why they are asking for money to stop the inspection of your box?

Best wishes,
Helen

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
They call it a non inspection fee based on the nature of the box package.
That is even preferable because if they inspect it, they will definitely
discover something, so the most secure way is for them to charge for a non
inspection fee and pass you or release your package, that is how others did
theirs and they left long time, but in my case nobody has come up to help
me clear the box.Because I could not communicate you due the seizure of my
phone and Michael could not reach me because same communication issue.

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
They have freed a lot of people, when they charge you and you pay their
fees, they will allow you to continue your journey.

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
That's interesting. How exactly do they determine the fees?

Best wishes,
Helen

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
That's interesting. Can you tell me more about how this non-inspection fee works? How did you come across this information?

Best wishes,
Helen

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
Please don't be scared, send me your information, there is no problem about
that, other people apprehended, their people sent their information and
they will just cross check with the luggages or boxes before they can start
their process for release, it's for checking only, it is not for anything
strange.

Your full name
Your contact address
Your mobile phone number
Any form of ID is OK.

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
The Cargo Manager - Airport Cargo Service determines the amount to pay for
each language or box or package, I have to go to their section to find out
how much they will charge for your package and how they will receive their
money, and I will revert to you.

Immediately you pay the non inspection fee they will release your box. But
what they need first is your information to make sure that the package is
not diverted, and it belongs to you. Send me your full name, contact
address and cell phone number, they want to make sure that your information
corresponds with the one on the box. Kindly do the needful, let's follow
their process.

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
I have made the inquiry and they are asking for $4,500.00 USD for the non
inspection fees.

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information about the Cargo Manager Airport Cargo Service. Could you tell me more about how they determine the amount to pay for each package? I'm curious to learn about their pricing structure and payment methods.

Best wishes,
Helen

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information. Can you tell me more about the process for release that you mentioned? I'm curious to learn how it works.

Best wishes,
Helen

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
Oh, I see. Could you tell me more about what the non-inspection fees are for? How did you come across this opportunity?

Best wishes,
Helen

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
Hello! That's interesting. Could you tell me more about what the non-inspection fees are for?

Best wishes,
Helen

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information about the Cargo Manager Airport Cargo Service. Could you tell me more about how they determine the amount to pay for each package? I'm curious to learn about their process.

Best wishes,
Helen

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing that information. Can you tell me more about why they need my personal details and ID for checking purposes? I just want to understand the process better.

Best wishes,
Helen

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
Question 1.  Hello! Thank you for sharing this information about the Cargo
Manager Airport Cargo Service. Could you tell me more about how they
determine the amount to pay for each package? I'm curious to learn about
their process.

Answer: Cargo Manager Airport Cargo Service said they charge per Weight and
Size and excess of the lagage and the dumerage of your box which is 1 month
with them, he said they have calculated everything and it came out to
$4,500.00

Their weight limitation is typically 5kg/11lbs (free carrier), and anything
above that will be charged as an excess weight and the box is 28kg/61.6
lbs. I asked him how much did they charge for the excess weight of 23kg and
30 days demurrage, he said they charge $100 per day on demurrage multiply
by 30 days which is $3,000.00 only, then the excess weight of 23kg is $65
per 1kg which is $1,495.00 so approximately the total is $4,495.00


Question 2. Hello! Thank you for sharing that information. Can you tell me
more about why they need my personal details and ID for checking purposes?
I just want to understand the process better.

Answer. I have answered this question before, they are using it to cross
check if the information pasted on the box matches with your information.
There is nothing bad about it, a lot of people are doing reconfirmation of
their information to cross check and to make sure you are the real owner.
Feel free about your information, it will hasten the process.

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing information about the Cargo Manager Airport Cargo Service. I appreciate your insights. Could you elaborate on how they determine the amount to pay for each package? I'm interested in understanding their process better.

Additionally, I noticed that they require personal details and ID for checking purposes. Can you provide more details on why this information is needed? I'm curious to learn more about their verification process.

Best wishes,
Helen

subject: Re: Sir,
body: I have answered all these questions, so stop repeating them.

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information. Can you tell me more about why my full name, contact address, mobile phone number, and ID are needed for the process? I just want to understand better before providing any personal details.

Best wishes,
Helen

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
I understand your frustration. Can you please clarify which specific questions you're referring to? I want to make sure I address your concerns accurately.

Best wishes,
Helen

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
Please I have answered all your questions, check my messages with you
throughout today, so there's no reason to repeat them, it's childish. I
have explained to you why they needed your personal information, I have
done that more than once. Your personal information is needed for
verification process in making sure you are the real owner of the box,
secondly to cross check your information to the one attached to the body of
the box and to prove there's no difference. I have done this elaboration
more than once.

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
Hello! I understand your concerns. Can you please clarify how my personal information is being used to ensure the security of the process? I just want to make sure everything is clear before proceeding.

Best wishes,
Helen

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
Not interested in more of your questions because I have done it all. You
are just making fool of me and I can't take it anymore. Please it's enough
and I don't need more of your questions.

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
I'm sorry to hear that you feel that way. I understand your concerns. Can you please share with me what specifically made you feel like I was making a fool of you? I want to make sure I address any misunderstandings and provide you with the information you need.

Best wishes,
Helen

subject: Re: Sir,
body: Repeating the same question made me feel that way. That's okay.

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
I understand, sometimes it can be frustrating when things are repeated. Is there anything else you would like to talk about or ask?

Best wishes,
Helen
